    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero​(java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String specialAbility,
            java.lang.String description,
            double maxHealth)
        Constructor called from the constructors of each Hero subclass. Initialises the instance variables of the hero to the values defined in that subclass.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the player assigned to the hero.
        type - The type of the Hero subclass.
        specialAbility - The special ability of the Hero subclass.
        description - The String description of the Hero subclass.
        maxHealth - The maximum health of the Hero subclass.
